channel.title: ~~= Adding NPC's =~~
channel.description:
Please note - I don't wanna know how to spawn 1 (::npc) :P
I want to know how to ADD a 1 into my server. So when I restart my server it will still be there. Help please? :o

item.title: ~~= Adding NPC's =~~
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

Where are the coordinates placed?
EDIT: Maybe the NPC isn’t supported in your Data Base, try a diffrent one.

Read full topic

I followed what you did but I added this:

When I start my server, everyone can’t log in, it says they are already logged in. I deleted it so now its fine. Can any1 spot my error?

item.title: ~~= Adding NPC's =~~
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

autospawn.cfg
go into your files and open up autospawn.cfg and put in something like this:
spawn =npcidTABxTAByTAB0TAB0TAB0TAB0TAB0TAB1TABname of npc

key:
npcid=you put in the npc id
x and y=you put in the x coords and y coords.
name of npc=the name of it.

99.99% to Zezimaisme111 and 00.1% to me for posting.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~= Adding NPC's =~~
item.dc:creator: @Amerks5 Amerks5
item.description:
@Amerks5 wrote:

Go to autospawn cfg and use this //------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption put that in autospawn.cfg and when it says range type 0 and walk type is 2 NPCID is its ID and Coordx and CoordY are its X and Y coordinates. There is a tutorial on this if you search

Read full topic
